Description:
Detects the deletion of AMSI provider registry key entries in HKLM\Software\Microsoft\AMSI. This technique could be used by an attacker in order to disable AMSI inspection.

Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Removal Of AMSI Provider Registry Keys
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where event_type = 'deletekey' and (target_object like '%{2781761e-28e0-4109-99fe-b9d127c57afe}' or target_object like '%{a7c452ef-8e9f-42eb-9f2b-245613ca0dc9}')
